properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 20 at 8:37AM AKST by NWS Anchorage, AK
properties.description:
Light to occasionally moderate snow will continue to cause slick
conditions and limit visibility along northern portions of the
Kenai Peninsula through midday. The several inches of powdery snow
that fell overnight into this morning will easily be resuspended
by fast moving vehicles on area highways. This can substantially
reduce visibilities. Conditions should improve this afternoon and
evening when the falling snow ends. Drivers are urged to leave
plenty of extra space between vehicles and to use caution.

NWSheadline: SNOW REDUCING VISIBILITY ALONG AREA HIGHWAYS
